content.detailedDescription: At approximately 10:30pm on april 15th, my husband and i heard a loud boom that sent us flying off of the couch.  it shook the house and sounded like something had exploded.  i immediately went outside but could hear no sirens only the faint sound a plane's engine.  having experienced many sonic booms i was shaken by this boom.  it was definitley different.  when i went to work the following morning (wednesday),in kokomo, no one had heard anything the previous night.  i  went back home that evening and did not hear anything on wednesday night.  however, upon returning to work on thrursday, everyone one in kokomo was talking about the boom on wednesday evening!  i was very intrigued by this.  when i returned home from work that night there was definitey increased plane activity in the sky.  these were jets, f-16's not the everyday plane you hear crossing the sky.  as it got dark, i was talking on the phone to my mother who lives in kokomo.  i was shocked when she began to become very excited about orange lights she was seeing in the sky.  i immediately went outside and looked to the southwest sky.  through the trees i saw a single orange sphere.  it was larger than a star and was not constantly lit.  i had been looking through a large open area of the tree and this orange light slowly came on, achieved it brightness and then dimmed again.  i only saw one light, it was stationary and unlike anything i had ever seen.  my mother saw 10-12 of the same type of lights that i saw.  i felt then and still feel that i saw something unexplained.  i wondered if there could be a connection between the booms heard in logansport and in kokomo and was very curious about the increase in plane activity that night.
content.summary: Boom heard in logansport the night before kokomo boom.

content.detailedDescription: the object or objects were 4inches apart at arms length traveling exactly same speed from the south going slightly n.E. only one of the lights grew bright and in size to a dime at arms length. it remained extremely bright white for 8 or 9 secs then slowly receded to the original light first noticed. that when i believed it was not as high up nearly as i thought. nothing else changed about it and it kept going till out of sight. exactly 12 mins later a helicopter coming from the west traveling as fast as possible followed after till i lost sight.
content.summary: Look like two small discs traveling in formation side by side but i believe it to be one large craft

content.detailedDescription: Driving north on i-75 just before wesley chapel, fl when i spotted a bright light in the sky.  figure was cross shaped with white blinking lights on each end and a very bright light in the middle.  object was stationary or slow moving.  object looked small so had to be at high altitude.
content.summary: Strange object flying near tampa north airport

content.detailedDescription:
Event repeated itself two nights.

bright light low over israel - original footage july 27th 2007


july 26th, 2:15 canadian pacific time, i browsed to israel's biggest newspaper "yediot ahronot"'s website, called "ynet".

in their main page was a link to reports of bright lights seen over israel. the report included a multitude of witnesses seeing two bright lights hovering over israel, being seen from the center of israel all the way to the south, a distance of roughly 150 km.

the article included viewer comments and can be found, in hebrew, here:

http://www.Ynet.Co.Il/articles/0,7340,l-3573410,00.Html

here is the geographical location of the reports:

www.Bemecollective.Com/pics/reportsarea.Jpg



the viewer comments included a heated debate whether these are military flares or not. such military flares are very common in israel. some "experts" claimed these are not flares while other "experts" claimed these are. many a religious commenter claimed these are signs from god and many other claimed meteors.
some claimed ufo's. the flares and meteor claims were problematic because people saw the things in the same place for two hours.

some reports said the ufo's were over beer sheva, in the south (city of biblical abraham for your religious crowd).

so i called my father (12:30am beer sheva time), woke him and wife. i wish for all of you to have a father (thanks, dr. t) that you can call in the middle of the night from over the ocean and tell him to open the window and scan for ufos!!!

instead of hanging the phone on me as expected, he told me he would call back. after 15 minutes he calls me and tells me that he is seeing a big bright light from his 7th floor balcony and filming it. the light is north by northeast roughly 2-3 degrees above the horizon. and far, very far (couldn't tell me how far. many kms).

here is the filming geographical location:

www.Bemecollective.Com/pics/loc1.Jpg

www.Bemecollective.Com/pics/loc2.Jpg




after he ran out of battery(8 minutes of raw footage) , i told him to start taking pictures with all the cameras in the house 

until all of them have full memory cards and then swap to reserve memory cards and continue.


he did, and called me in the morning.

the results are as follows: many digital stills which show a bright dot 2-3 arc degress over the horizon. the stills are very dark and just show where the dot is.

the footage is better. in full zoom it is quite overexposed but we can clearly see the relative brightness of the light compared to the city street lights. the object was observed for ~15 minutes before it dissapeared.

stills (there are many more, all same quality):

www.Bemecollective.Com/pics/still1.Jpg

www.Bemecollective.Com/pics/still2.Jpg

www.Bemecollective.Com/pics/stillzoom.Jpg



and here is the movie, unedited:

www.Bemecollective.Com/pics/beershevalight.Wmv

www.Bemecollective.Com/pics/beershevalight2.Wmv


i also checked the star and planet location for israel at the time, jupiter was in the south, no other bright stars visible to the north, as you can see here:

www.Bemecollective.Com/pics/israelsky_nbyne_july27th12_30am.Jpg


a compilation of all the ynet comments into a map.
center is close to betlehem.


http://www.Bemecollective.Com/pics/loc4.Jpg



-----------

so i analyzed the video and found the following.
there is some sort of 'light beam' emitting downward straight vertical from the light.
luckily the light is positioned exactly near a side of a tall building, so we can see that the 'beam' is parallell to the dark building.
the camera itself is not horizontal, so the 'beam', and the building are 5-6 degrees off vertical.
the 'beam' shoots only down, nothing sideways or up. 
for comparison to a camera glare, see the pic called beershevalight1_0004_nobeamfromstreetlights.Jpg where we can see both the main light with beam and the street lights without.

the first four picture where clarified:

www.Bemecollective.Com/pics/beershevalight1_0001.Jpg
www.Bemecollective.Com/pics/beershevalight1_0002.Jpg
www.Bemecollective.Com/pics/beershevalight1_0003.Jpg
www.Bemecollective.Com/pics/beershevalight1_0004_nobeamfromstreetlights.Jpg


the next two pics are one embossed and one extremely clarified.

www.Bemecollective.Com/pics/beershevalighemboss1.Jpg
www.Bemecollective.Com/pics/beershevalight1_clarified.Jpg

why i think it's not a glare:

1. it's only in one direction, true down.
2. it doesn't happen with the street lights.
3. it is the only other detail seen in the emboss.

but i cannot be sure. it could be a glare. for you to decide. i'll post more info when i have it.

strange or what?


best regards,

arit
content.summary: Bright light over israel

content.detailedDescription:
At 11:45 a.M. monday, july 28, 2008 -

my 10 year-old son came to tell me he saw a "very metallic" silver-colored ufo. he saw it for about 5 seconds, and it disappeared. he observed the object moving northeast, (we are about 5 miles northeast of o'hare) in a wavelike rhythm, small wave, big wave, small, big, big, big.  by his description, it could have gone from o'hare towards lake michigan somewhere around the wisconsin border in this time. 

we sent outside and looked in the area he saw it disappear. (totally clear sky today) within 2 minutes, we both saw the same object my son described, rectangular, with rounded edges. that is called a cylinder as we looked it up. it was not shiny, it was paler, gray, and but became paler, blending in an opague fashion against the clear sky as it was moving due north for about 5 seconds and we watched it disappear from our view. the color contrasr was interesting as in the short distance it went, it first was pale gray and hard to describe, wither changing color or dematerializing type effect. (going up?)

it was traveling northeast from the northern point of o'hare airport.
he observed the object for approximately 5 seconds, moving in a wavelike rhythm, small wave, big wave, small, big, big, big. we are 5 miles from o'hare.

i do not know how to interperet size. we all know what an airplane looks at 35,000 feet against clear skies, as you cannot see 3d. this was way up there, as far as we could see. if you put your hand up, to measure with a thumb and forefinger, it's a good 2.5 inches. by this measure it had to be a huge object. how far can we see in a blue sky x 2.5 inches. very intriguing..
content.summary: Cylinder shaped ufo, seen twice,  edison park, chicago near o'hare airport

content.detailedDescription:
I was doing yardwork and heard an airliner passing over head. i looked up and noticed an orange object just above the airliner. they were heading east, the airliner along a usual route. the object was orange, seemed to be glowing. it was flying about two thousand feet above the airliner and moving slower. the airliner soon faded from view and about 20 seconds later the object also faded from view. the object was flying at a consistant speed and never changed shape or color. the orange color was similar to that of an orange traffic cone. it was about the size and shape of an oval pill held out at arms length, or of a blimp. about half the length of the airliner fuselage. there was nothing coming off the object, it was very smooth. 
the sun had set, and the weather was clear. it was still too light for satellites to be seen. the object was moving too slow to be a meteor and lasted too long to be an iridium flare.
content.summary: Orange object flying near airliner

content.detailedDescription: My daughter was taking pictures of clouds and when we down loaded it on the computer we noticed a dark disk shape object that was dark grey in color. we would like to know what this object is in the picture.
content.summary: My daughter took a picture of clouds and when we down loaded it on the computer we noticed a disc shape object that is dark grey in color. we are not sure what the object is so we would like some help with this situation

content.detailedDescription:
Observation conditions

it was getting darker, but the object was very visible against the clouds lighted by the setting sun. the sun was below the horizon already, with only the clouds receiving light. the weather was overcast (70% of the sky covered by clouds) with a very light breeze - maybe 1 or 2 on the beaufort scale.
there was a big tree between myself and the object, that impeded my view whilst the object passed behind it, but i observed it before and after it passed behind the tree.

object description

there was only one object, black and probably best described as a diamond, though i can't give a perfect description of its shape, even after consulting myself with other witnesses. we all agree it was round shaped but presented angles. however, it wasn't so pointed as the standard diamond shape. bar its black colour and slightly odd shape, the object presented no other features, such as lights or markings. it was also perfectly silent, with no trails of smoke whatsoever that would imply any kind of reaction propulsion. it had no wings or rotor blades either. it never changed shape, colour, and i haven't observed any aura or haze around it.

the object moved bearing sw with about 100 km/h (approx. 60 mph) at an altitude i'd appreciate somewhere between 70 and 150 meters. (200-450 ft.) the object appeared to be 6-8 meters in diameter (18-25 ft.)

conclusions

as the object moved at a 45��� angle to my position, i was able to observe it from different perspectives, and as such i can to state that it didn't looked like any type or aircraft known to me, and i'm pretty savvy about such things. the absence of position lights, sound and features (wings or rotor blades) would also indicate that it was no civilian aircraft. i can also eliminate the hypothesis that it was a blimp or balloon due to the speed it moved at, with no wind to speak of. the clouds weren't moving either, which eliminates the possibility of wind at higher altitudes. there was silent enough for the sound of an engine to be heard, but there wasn't any. there were no other aircraft nearby and its trajectory followed none of the streets, which eliminates for me the eventuality that is was pulled from the air or from the ground. there was also no such things as a rope to be seen. the visibility was excellent, as the clouds were very bright with no sun to impede direct observation.

at this point, it's an unidentified flying object for me. i'd be very glad and interested to hear another opinion(s). i'm also glad to answer any question you might have regarding this incident. as english isn't my first language, i'd be also happy to clarify any questions which may arise due to the poor wording, if applicable.

answering additional questions

there was a second witness which will remain anonymous.
1. swimming in a pool outside our city of munich, in a small town 50 km to the east - bad aibling.
2. the second witness spotted the object on the sky, just by incidentally looking in that direction
3. the object looked strange enough for us both to ask "hey, what's that?!" it looked in the first second like a spheric helicopter heading directly towards me, but i very quickly realised that it can't be the cockpit of such an aircraft, and it's not heading towards me. it took me under one second to realise.
4. the object was described, and it just followed a straight path.
5. we merely observed the object with interest. we moved a bit around to minimise the time it was hidden by the tree. no special feelings other than i had no idea what am i looking at. we discussed the incident after we lost sight of the object.
6. the object disappeared in the distance, hidden by buildings as it flew its path.
content.summary: Ufo sighted over bad aibling

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving back from cruising down a1a to south beach.    we decided to return home on i-95 northbound to deerfield beach.  as we admired the light show of the lightning reflectons behind each individual cloud,  i noticed, though, that the clouds were no longer individually placed against the sky.  they had now converged over a certain area.  none of the lightning was touching down to earth.  a coned/cylindrical shaped, greenish-yellow light beam was projected down from the converged clouds  onto an area of ft. lauderdale.  

the beam was rather wide.  we were about 4-5 miles away, i would guess.  this beam was too wide to be from a helicopter, it came from way too high and was not copter quality light. it was not transluscent.  i am very familiar with those search lights which come out yellowish white or white.  there was no copter during or after the phenomenon.  this beam just shone down and did not search around.  it lasted about 2-3 seconds. 

we all were stunned.  i said, "ughhhhh, hmmm, that was not a search light, now, was it?" all answered, "no!"  my friend in the front seat cautious and in disbelief asked, "soooo, what exactly was it."  i answered, "welll, could be one of two things..... a ufo or black budget electro-magnetic experiments with the weather?   

not sure exactly what a beam would be doing coming from that but my guess was a shot in the dark.

i have already seen ufos as reported by the government in peru while i was there.  now i can say i have seen the beam.  i hope never to see them together!!!!!

peace be with us all
content.summary: Cone shaped, greenish-yellow, light beam

content.detailedDescription:
I was getting ready to go to work at the telephone company. i was sitting watching the nightly news and felt a humming sound/sensation. i went to the back yard and witnessed a huge rectagular craft hovering over the house. it was very, very large (football size?) and very, very quiet. just that humming sensation and slow gliding motion. there were "windows" on the side, lights that were fairly dim, no flashing. i watched it glide over for several minutes. when it was approximately over several streets away it just took off and was out of sight in seconds. no noise, no flashing lights, nothing. of course to this day my family thinks i am nuts, or they pat me on the head and say, yes, yes, we know. but............I saw something!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

oh yes, the underside appeared to have ridges or indentations. when i got to work i mentioned what had happened to one of my co-workers. she said her husband said he thought he had seen a "ufo" at the same time when he was taking out the trash. there were reports several days later that some simi valley police had tried to chase a "ufo" but it was too fast and disappeared. that was the last time it was ever mentioned publicly.
content.summary: Object hovered over house then zipped away fast

content.detailedDescription: This past saturday night around 3am tecnically sunday morning, my partner and i went to bed, within a few minutes about 10 if i had to be exact, i was stariing at the ceiling which i have done many times before, when i began to notice it looked like a snow storm of stars, i just thought my eyes were focusing in the darkness when it stated to intisify, i began to worry about my health, i am only 34 years old so i have no known health problems, but the ceiling almost seemed like i was traveling tru sapce, when i finnaly told my partner laying next to me that the ceiling was looking really strange to me, when he said yes what is that, and i said what you can see that, he said yes, whe then proceeded to lay there ad watch what seemed to be a cosmic show, when suddenly i felt something around my foot or ankle and began to feel little pin pricks on various parts of my body, i began to scream and crawl up the bed cliching partner tellig him i swear i just felt something touch me,we both began to panic and then we sorta of laughed it off and i layed back flat on my back and began look at ceiling but this  time there was a much more intense illumination beaming from the ceiling and at the foot of the bed, as i started to look closer to my horror i saw a huge face at the foot of the bed surging tword me or hovering in the mist of this fog or haze or illumination,moving like i never seen something move, panic stuck me like never before and before i could reaaly process what was happing another green like glowing vapor or haze appeared around the side of the bed and to my disbelief i saw about 15 or so smaller sized beings appearing in the haze i began to scream and cry like a child,remind you i am a 34 year old man who does not just break down sobbing in terror,while my partner began to panic he did not see what i saw ,as i wrestled to clutch for my partner and flip my body twords the other direction i was struck with intense pain in my upper back on the right side like something did not want me to get away. my partner leaped out in terror at what i was doing and fliped on the light trying to reassure me that there was nothing in the room. i dont know what this all means but but the faces of the smaller ones were thoose alien faces we have all seen many times over the years, and i was shocked beyond belief, they appeared to be observing the bigger interdimensional one,i cannot get this experience out my head, is there any one that can help me. i am attaching of a drwaing of what i saw
content.summary: Glowing haze or vapor or fog or something

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my front porch smoking a cig when i saw something out the corner of my eye to the right. i looked up in the sky and saw a sphere pulsating and move very slow in the sky. it looked very high in the sky traveling south to north! i lost it once it moved behind some trees.  i took some pictures with a vivicam3785,  zoom in on the pictures and you can see the sphere.
content.summary: Ufo was white and would pulsate  brighter and dim out.

content.detailedDescription:
I found this extraordinary video entitled "ufo mile long" and dated january 13, 2008 at http://www.Metacafe.Com/w/1187634/. it was submitted by ig4you on march 25, 2008. 

although no location is given, i suspect it was filmed in texas, because the images fit the descriptions of all the sightings in and and around stephenville,tx around the same dates in january 2008.

perhaps, mufon and/or your collaborators at ufo hunters could investigate further. good luck!
content.summary: Huge black rectangular craft, 2 luminous blobs and a rigid sphere

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my dog out to go the bathroom and i was looking up at the sky it was around 9-10pm so it was still a little light out, somthing amber like the size of a star was cruzing in a strait line coming form the southwest going northeast, it looked like it was low 1500 feet or so just a guess, and then it just flashed the britest florescent blue then went back to the amber and i  could hardly see it but it was still  there, then was gone that fast never seen anything like it ever. i know it was not a commit cuz there was no tail of any kind it was the most vivid florecent blue i have ever seen the blue light when it flashed was alot bigger then the oject it self weird.
content.summary: Starlike moving faster then a plain then flashed floresent blue and went dim again then disaperd

content.detailedDescription: I was on a bicycle tour between l.A. and s.F. with a couple of friends, and we took a break in ken adam park. shortly after arriving at the park, one of my friends pointed to the east and said "what is that?" i looked to where he was pointing, and saw a huge (aircraft carrier sized) dark rectangle hovering over the hills behind the park. it had no features that we could see, and it made no noise. it would stay in one position for a while, then slowly drift in one direction, then become stationary again, before drifting in another direction. we watched it until it became too dark to see it anymore. at the time, i knew we were somewhere nearby vandenberg air force base, but not being familiar with that area, did not realize til some time after the the base was very close. as the object did not do anything that could be seen as hostile, or even come nearer to us, i was mostly curious, and we talked about what it might be. none of us came up with any real explanations.
content.summary: Dark grey or black

content.detailedDescription: Late aug. of 2007 my wife, my son, and myself were fishing on the duck river bank facing east right about dusk. it was not quit dark out yet and cloudy when we saw a very bright orange burst of light shoot straight across the horizon low in the sky directly infront of us, but a long ways off. (kind of like the sun but not as intense) it disappeared within 2 seconds. we were still looking up at the sky and about 3 seconds after seeing the fireball an object that was grey or almost the exact same color of the evening sky shot by us at an extreme rate of speed. the object was 10' infront of us and about 20-30' up. we were fishing at a place on the river were the river makes about a 90 degree bend. the object seemed to be following the river at a speed so fast that we could not even make out a shape only a color. it was well below the top of the trees, there was no sound and no wind what so ever from the object. do to the rate it was travling it makes guessing the size very hard. best guess about as long as a vw bug but not as tall. if we had not been looking upwards anyway we would had never known it passed over. there were no lights on it that i could see and do to the rate of speed and a river bank full of trees it was gone in one second. there wasn't any time for reaction it was over quickly. none of us felt scared just amazed.
content.summary: Fire ball in the sky long ways off then small object less than 40' away 200+miles an hour

content.detailedDescription: Was taking pics with my nikon coolpix 5 megapixel 3x zoom and then when downloaded today i saw this object, i was on the grass in front of the house, since it did not appear when i took the picture i did not know that it was there.
content.summary: Just took a picture and noticed after download to computer

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of august 10 2005, a few friends and myself were relaxing on the front porch of my home when this bizzare incident happened. in this area of upstate ny there are alot of low mountains and valleys, its a low populated area so there is not alot of light polution. it was a clear night. we were sitting there on the porch when suddenly my friend said look up there! what is that?? i looked up and could not beleive my eyes it was a large spacecraft flying slowly at about 10 mph and about 50 feet above us it was flying through the valley and not above the mountains (possibly to avoid radar)?
there was absolutely no sound what so ever, it was so silent you could even hear the ambeint sounds of the woods behind us crickets and whatnot. but i felt other than fear exitement, a strange electrifying sensation throughout my body, my friends also felt the same. the size of the craft was astronomical! i know the exact width of the valley and the hight of the 2 mountains im a geologist by trade. valley width 450 meters mountain hight a 118m mountain b 172 meters . the crafts tips must of came within 10 meters of touching the 2 mountains! so it was about 420 meters wide. you must think im crazy by now. it was atleast 3x longer than its width. the craft itself was a different color than the night sky a deep almost royal purple there was sets of slow pulsing orange lights on the back possibly propultion engines or something of that manner there were windows on the side of the craft or veiwports were i could see the inside of the craft very clearly there were humanoid forms in the windows standing there gazing out i presume looking at us. we were all very frightened after the incident my freinds decided to leave but i couldnot sleep was too frightend by the whole experience and spent the night sitting on the porch with my 12 gauge shotgun loaded and ready just incase. despite my effort to stay awake and after a hard days work i fell asleep on the porch, now you would imagine that i would wake up there on the porch in the morning right? simple logic yes? fall asleep in one place and wake up there a few hours you dont need to be a rocket scientist to understand that concept. wrong! i "woke up" a couple of days later august the  12th 930am according to my watch. in the forrest not dressed in my own clothes a few miles away luckilly for me i was able to find a road and flag down the state police. unfortunatly for me  they pressumed i was an insane homeless man and brought me in for phyciatric evaluation but there tests proved that i was sane. they didnt beleive my story im fearfull of contacting the government or telling anyone  else. this has left me tramaticly scarred for the rest of my life. i now live and will most likely die in nyc i feel more comfertable there surrounded by millions of people. and will never go into the countryside again.
content.summary: Ufo slow flight/hovering through the mountains

content.detailedDescription:
Me and a friend were standing on his patio in his backyard.
it was about 11:20 pm ,that while looking in a north-west direction
that i noticed two saucer-shaped objects flying together towards
a south-east direction.
they were flying very-very fast and turned together towards south.
they looked like they had a pink=green haze around them.
i've been reading about ufo's since i was 16.  i also live
about 10 min.From the airport,so i know airplanes and what they
look like. 
these were 2 disks that were flying in formation,moving exactly
the speed and direction.
this is my fourth sighting in all of my life.
this one was really spectacular to me..And my friend!
the whole incident lasted about 10 seconds....They turned to their
right and disappeared behind his house.
i'd say they were about at least 200 feet in diameter..And that they were moving at least 1000kph.
there..Had to get this off my chest.
thank you!
content.summary: 2 saucers flying very fast mirroring each other

content.detailedDescription:
I was sat outside my home with my husband and brother in law and i had my baby son on my knee and we were looking for "dickie birds" when we noticed this strange object in the sky. at first we thought it may be parachuters, but the objects were not decending at all. the objects were arrow or boomerang shaped and were black in colour.The objects were traveling very slowly horizontally, but kept making quick movements,as if breaking formation, and would rise vertically quite quickly. there were about three to four in total. it seampt like they were spiriling upwards at times. after a couple of minuets of observing them my husband went in search of the binoculars. no sooner had he got in the house that there then appeared what i can only describe as a bright orb. this orb travelled towards the objects in a straight line then went in an arch over the objects and continued on its horizontal course then dissapeared. by this time my husband had returned with the binoculars and tried to focus on the objects. but as the binoculars are not very powerful the objects were too far away for them to focus properly. however my husband described what he saw as three dark arrow head shaped objects.
we watched the objects fly slowly away untill they dissapeared from sight.
none of us could say what these objects were even though we observed them for about 8 mins.We all agreed we had not seen anything like it before.It was definately a very strange experience.
content.summary: Objects flew at low level  very slowly in arrow formation, there was no trail behind and they rose and fell quickly

content.detailedDescription: While driving down route 3 off of i-95 towards south china in vassalboro area it was dark over route 3 what seemed like 5 miles i noticed a star like object very high up just fall to the ground the star was dark red in color droped for many thousands of feet then just hovered about 2 thosand feet above road i am doing about 40 mph and watching it my sateilite radio then started to have servere interferance at this point it hovered for 30 -40 seconds then went to the south at a high rate of speed radio worked fine after this- time was 9pm 7/25/2008 driving home from work sky was clear and mars does not do these types of displays
content.summary: Star like object deep red in color

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching a turkey vultcure with my bino's and seen an object in the background, then i focused in on the object for about 9-10 seconnds and watched it disapeer behined a cloud i watched the cloud for about four minutes and it did not re-apper. this all acoured while i sat on my back patio witch faces east. the object moved faster then the airplanes in the area at the time there was one plane very high moving due west to the north of me and another plane moving north above me. the object in question was at about 120 degrees and about 60-65 degrees above the horizion.It looked bright white and lumanesent.
 and moved from the north to the south when it went behine the cloud, i looked for it to come but it never did, the cloud was not very wide or tall but was conected to a larger cloud i tried to project its path but it never appeared so it must have stopped in the cloud or turned within the cloud. this is something i would not expect a weather baloon or an airplane to do. i could see three sides of the cloud formation with my bino's.By the way i was using bushnell 10x50 with a feild of 5.5'
content.summary: I was watching a turkey vultcure with my bino's and seen the oblect in the back ground

content.detailedDescription: I was asleep but my partner was awake because from nowhere firworks were being lit and fired off. my partner woke me up because he saw these things and he was freaked out, i missed the first part of this however he saw them from the beginning he exclaimed they just rose from the distance into the sky (like a firework), but then they took a straight left direction, which fireworks do not do!!! it was around 11.15pm. in the distance, high up, the first bright light moved across the sky in a straight line, it was not flashing but it was bright - it was bright orange/ytellow and had no ditinct shape to it, like a fuzzy outline i suppose you could say circular. at first i thought 'plane' but then i saw the other one and was like, ok thats definatly not a plane, with no flashing lights it just wasn't possible. what was strange is and determined suspicions that what we were witnessing was not natural not man made (i.E aircraft) was that the first one stopped dead and didn't move, as the second object got closer it was practically next to it, when they were together as a pair they started to disappear, it was like it was waiting for the second object to join it. it looked as though they were flying so high into the sky that they disapearred they got fainter and fainter. more beculiar was that the third light followed the same path and when it got to the same spot it did exactly as the other 2 did. i was so intrigued, i could not explain it. me and my partner were not the only witnesses as there was a couple who saw them and i heard them say how weird it was, then minutes later another group of people walked by and they said 'how is it possible two aircrafts could be that close together with no sound being heard either'. i could not sleep for the rest of the night i was constantly at the window with my camera and camcorder hoping i could see them again, but they were long gone, it was weird. i felt scared that these could be real, i have never thought about alians or strange beings as i think sometimes there honest explanations, in this case, how cleverly they moved direction (so smoothly), i cannot provide an explanation, hoping that someone else can, i was so freaked out, i have never seen anything like this before.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 x bright orange lights, steadily moving, in a straight line one by one

content.detailedDescription:
This happened when i was nine or ten and for reasons that well i thought i had been rejected by god so i kept quiet. first i knew i was being lifted only a foot or so then as i fell back within my room it closed in like a bubble but the last thing of the bubble i saw was normally quarter of a mile away. next day slight differences some walls in school different and the wall with gas cylinders gone and curriculum very slightly different. 

so what i do know is that i heard one sentence like i was an object "this one well pleases me" i remember that because the words were in that order. by the time i was teenage i figured it had to do with time and two years ago first looked at science and found we aren't even going in that direction.

ok it sounds daft but i have put together an idea that if instead of particles the initial fireball of inflation from the big bang was whirlpools due to localized cool in swirling energy a whirlpool would form. to cut a long story short it goes back to the einstein idea of wormholes. in order to work the proton formed and the wormhole stretches from the formation in the fireball and reconnects in a six dimension hourglass shape making a connection in time from the beginning of the start of the universe to a reconnection at the end of the dark epoch. so all of time is connected beginning to end and back and that is how structures are formed in time although the tyranny of distance still applies.

1. check points yes it was dark in my room but i was most certainly awake and sort of separate to the actual lift although i rose upwards and the collapse of the bubble of one reality to this about eight to ten seconds from hearing voice.2. hard not to notice. 3. forgive a nine year old i answered are you sure you got the right one? then it was gone. 4. not visible just a lifting and the voice then the bubble but i figure the changes were caused by something further back in time because the buildings and curriculum seemed to have been around and not new. 5. surprise, relief and i didn't move but i could if i wanted to but i didn't go looking for it.

since then other sightings but just distant high altitude so i can't be sure may have been a meteor flash and one time a cloud of ball lightening. now i am pretty sure about the connection in time forming from the beginning of the universe and reconnecting in the dark epoch. matter experienced at a node or dimension right angle is still matter so it all works the same way gravity and the forces but the connections in real space are there. the shape is like connecting two klein bottles together each can be the single side of either a circle or torus and in the case of a torus connect gives an hourglass connecting atomic symmetry.

i hope this helps.
content.summary: Enclosed and lifted a foot or two then reality shifted presumably in time.

content.detailedDescription: Friday 25 of 2008 i was outside because a strange lightning broke down the transformator in the sector that is around my house i was playing ds light outside in front of my house then when was 10:00 pm i got into my house again because my dog dalila was scratching the door so i can let her out because she is scare to the dark, but i stayed inside of my house then around 11:57 or 58 i felt like a presence  like someone watching me outside my window so i got out to check but nothing! ,i always like to se the sky and stars so i looked up to the sky ,there was like a light bright like yelloish,red and blue it was changing colors so i got impresed so i had my celphone with me so i took the exact time , i was going to record it but is that i couldnt move because of the impresion , the lights started to get a little away so i moved to the center of the street to get a better view , then the lights stated to flow in circules and form diferent patterns i knew that wasnt a common star , the light started to move vertical then dissapears and i was like what!!! where it go! and i looked all over the sky but nothing ,then like in 4 seconds a star that passes like a shooting star super fast but 4 me it wasnt i think it was the ufo that dissapeard seconds ago.After the sighing of that strange lights i run to my parents to say to them mom dad i was outside and something was moving very fast in the sky but they dint believed me they told me that was probbably a jet but i know that wasnt a jet it was moving to fast and dissappeard like in 2 seconds a jet dosent dissapears and it dosent goes too fast! and yeah! im 13 years old but the things is that if you stare at the stars on the night you can totally see them moving so that so not stars the ufos can totally camoflage through the stars so be careful sometimes they are not stars! i say this because last year i was in my houses pool and i always see like around 9:45 stars moving but you have to take time to look at them because the really small ones are the ones that moves i've been experiencing this thing since i was a little girl when i had 6 years old on october 31, i know we are not alone in the universe!
content.summary: A light bright  circuling the sky the gone!!! like in 3 seconds !!!!!!!!!

content.detailedDescription: Iwas sitting on a bench in friedrichstrasse in the centre of berlin. i was a very hot sultry evening and i had not been drinking or taken any drugs. there appeared in the eastern sky 2 slow moving fireballs that processed slowly across the sky before being obscured by a building. they were completely silent and no one l else seemed to notice although the angle that i was sitting at meant that people were not naturally looking in that direction. the entire sighting lasted about a minute and i believe that they were at about 2 thousand feet. i am not interested in ufos and can offer no obvious explanation. both their path and speed were constant.
content.summary: I saw 2 slow moving fireballs in the eastern sky over berlin.

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and my wife were on our balcony smoking late at night which was clear of clouds. although there is high light pollution in our area we could still manage to see a couple of faint stars in the night sky. there where also several planes flashing away on their normal flight path to heathrow airport which runs around in a circle. i noticed a brighter than usual star which i had not noticed before and pointed it out to my wife. i exclaimed that it was strange to see such brightness considering the light polution around us and pointed out that it could not have been a plane or helicopter due to the lack of flashing etc. as we watched the star, it began to move from it's static position away from us which must have been at speed considering it's height. once this happened i turned to my wife and explained that what we were watching was an honest to goodness ufo and due to it's flight path was definately not usual or normal. the ufo/star moved away from the sky above straight over trellic tower which is a local landmark in west london.

i am sure that other residents must have seen it also. unfortunately i did not have any equipment to hand with which to photograph or film the event.

regards
content.summary: Starlike orb in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from melbourne to orlando (up i-95) at 12:21 am when i noticed a bright light low to the north. at first i just assumed it was a plane, with its' landing lights on, heading into either patrick afb or merrit island airport.

as i have been a practicing amateur astronomer for 50 years (and still remain very active at a high level of observing programs and technology...In fact, i have the second- largest privately owned telescope in the state),i knew immediately that this apparition was not astronomical in nature.

for one thing, it was too low and either stationary or barely moving. i could see the first deck of low clouds behind the object.

again, this could still have been a slow-moving airplane flying directly towards me so that i would not notice any apparent motion. but it just wasn't getting anywhere!

now i'm thinking it's a helicopter, hovering above i-95...Maybe a medevac unit. by bow it is extremely bright (estimate magnitude -4)and i realize it is not one light source, but two...Apparently connected by a truss or some sort of shaft or construct. the two main lights are yellowish-white and are so intense that they are causing retinal flaring.
halfway between the two brightest lights is a much fainter one that is blinking red very rapidly.

as it still shows no apparent motion i speed up to over 90mph to try and get to it before it an go away. as i get closer, the angle begins to go vertical so i know i about to get under it. one last (head out the window) look tells me it is directly overhead, so i jam the brakes, stop the car and jump out ready to either id it visually or by sound.

i should add that i am also a pilot and my love-affair with aviation goes back as far as my love for astronomy.

i mean no arrogance when i say that i can readily identify anything that flies (at least that we've been told about). my wife and i both are avid "plane-spotters" (she worked with the airlines for many years).
when e live in california in the 80's, we'd take "expeditions" up near edwards afb just to see if anything "new" was in the air. we saw both the f-117 stealth fighter and the b-2 stealth bomber several years before they were announced to the public. we certainly did not experience any sense of the unknown at that time as we new perfectly well they were the long anticipated stealth planes.

i'm fairly certain i also observed the "aurora: hypersonic craft in a nighttime pass over the antelope valley. that was all fun. this is not!

back to the chase: i shut off the car, opened the door, jumped out, and the object was gone! it had been directly over me less than 5 seconds earlier! i futiley searched the sky for just normal aircraft navigation lights, thinking in had been a pland and the high intesity lights had been shut off. nothing. then it hit me - there was also no sound.
had there been a plane (especially a helicopter)that was now flying off i would have clearly heard it. just 5 seconds from "now you see it" to "now you don't".

in the aforementioned 50 years of serious astronomy i have seen comets,
meteors, space junk re-entry into the atmosphere, i know the 100 brightest stars by their proper names and i can tell you almost without thinking where every planet visible to the naked eye is!

i can also identify any airplane known to man by sight
and somejust by hearing their sound (yes even jet engines sound differently and the wind rushing through the various orifices and around the wings and fuselage also makes a sound all its' own)

this is the very first time (out of thousands of hours spent 'under the stars')that i have seen something that i cannot explain.

i make no claim that this was an "alien craft".
unfortunately the term ufo has become synonymous with "flying saucer", but
what i saw was truly just an unidentified flying object.

i plotted where i was (and it was) on google earth. when i was directly under it, i was 13 miles from the kennedy launch complex to the ne and 13 miles to patrick afb to the se.

it's almost 7am...I've been up all night puzzling over this.
if there is any correalation with additional reports you may receive, i would appreciate hearing from you.
content.summary: Imagine a majorette's flaming  baton. at each end is a tremendously bright light and in between the lights, along the long axis of the baton itself is a fainter, blinking, red light . the object was ~1500' above i-95 and was not moving.

content.detailedDescription:
data sheet  
	
11 'planes' with fins, not wings, over ellesmere, shropshire uk on 11th july 2008	

observers	
date & time:	friday, 11th july 2008. 1435 hours.

place: we were exiting the outskirts of ellesmere, shropshire, uk by car at 30 mph on a528 towards overton on dee, driving in a north west direction.

observers: self (driving car); partner(passenger)

weather:	bright daylight; occasional high banks of cloud; no wind; no rain. visibility excellent.

feelings:	amazement at their sudden appearance, at the number of planes, their unfamiliar shapes and how low and slowly they were flying. i used to work in an aircraft factory for british aerospace, and i am familiar with jet planes and jet aircraft engines at very close quarters. 

other witnesses:
1) witness a, at work in ellesmere: ""probably on their way to shawbury airfield."  n.B. raf shawbury is about 14 miles to the south east of ellesmere. no public spectator events were scheduled for this week on the station calendar. low flying helicopter and fixed wing training is carried out in this area; air traffic controllers are trained here. see http://www.Raf.Mod.Uk/rafshawbury/flyinginfo/lowflying.Cfm

2) witness n, at work in ellesmere: ""i saw 5, then 4, then two single planes. someone said they were lightning jets, but i don't know how he would know." n.B the planes we saw bore absolutely no resemblance to lightnings - see http://www.Lightningusa.Org/index.Html"

planes
	
formations:	 11 off planes, grouped in 2 off arrowheads, followed by 2 singles - 5 + 4 + 1 + 1. last plane manouvering to join the tail of the formation.

shape /appearance: square, long box-shaped fuselage, open at rear; narrow, swept back wings -more like narrow fins than wings, with little surface area to provide lift; heavy, rugged all-metal construction, resembling worn sheet aluminium; old-looking technology, not aerodynamic nor streamlined; no tail; no external engines; no ailerons; no cockpit; no markings; no armaments; no aerials or external appendages; no wheels or sign of wheel bays . me: "i've no recollection of shape of nose - can't think why not." partner: "i think the nose was slightly rounded, thunderbirds style." neither of us can remember seeing a cockpit, pilot, escape canopy, probe, radar cone etc on the front.

colour:	gunmetal grey / black, looking well used and not new. not painted.

direction:	heading south east, towards the centre of ellesmere town, just a few hundred yards away.

sound:	heard above car's diesel engine - passenger window open.
loud roar, but not  sufficiently ear-splitting for 11 jet engines a few hundred feet away.

smell:	no smell of avtur or fumes etc, despite their close proximity and that our journey continued under their approach path.

exhaust:	no flames, vapour or sign of air turbulence from open rear of box fuselage. 

height:	flying say 150 ft to 300 ft above ground level. very low, and approaching the built-up area of ellesmere town. 

speed:	flying at say 100mph maximum - probably slower as they were in our sight for a few seconds, despite our view being restricted to a few hundred yards to front and rear because of adjacent trees.

size:	small. say less than half the size of a harrier jet.

separation:	very close. say 20 ft between planes.

uk major aeronautical events near this time:
	
1) the royal international airshow at fairford - approx 100 miles to the south east of ellesmere - on 12th and 13th july has been cancelled for the first time in 38 years because of very heavy rain.Http://www.Airtattoo.Com/	
	
") the farnborough international airshow held from 14th to 20th july 2008.
farnborough is approximately 170 miles south east of ellesmere. see http://www.Farnborough.Com/	
	
3)the royal air force's aerobatic team, the red arrows, whose planes look nothing like the ones we saw, are not listed as displaying at any public events on 11th july, but were due to fly at fairford and farnborough in the following days - see http://www.Raf.Mod.Uk/reds/displayinfo/july08.Cfm ."
content.summary: Eleven half-size 'planes' with fins, not wings, flying in two arrowhead formations, very low and very slowly, apparently without engines.

content.detailedDescription:
New orleans july 26, 2008, around 7:40 pm.
about a half hour before sunset, with sprinkles of rain, and thunder showers in the area. i went outside in the back garden to look at the sky, which was unusually bright. the low angle of the sun reflecting off the clouds was coloring everything with bright pinkish light. looking at the clouds above my house to the northeast, i saw a black circle or sphere moving across the sky from east to west. i could see the circular shape very clearly but could not see any depth to say for sure if it was a sphere. it passed almost directly overhead, and i remember it was more like looking up into the blackness of the lens of a camera rather than at a spherical object. it was solid and not billowy like a balloon. my impression was of a surveillance device rather than a vehicle. i could not judge its size or elevation without any reference point, although it was below the clouds. it followed a curving path rather than a straight path, as if it were compensating for flying into the wind. it passed quickly out of view in just a few seconds. shortly after i lost sight of it a couple of birds flew along a similar path, giving me the impression it was about the same height and scale as the birds. if i had to estimate it i'd say it was more on the scale of a beach ball and in the 200 foot elevation and not a blimp-sized object at thousands of feet. right after that some menacing dark clouds moved in very quickly from the north and it started raining.
content.summary: Black dot traveling below clouds
